name: Total Paid Amount
query:
SELECT 
    SUM(paid.paid_amount) AS total_payments_received
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
JOIN 
    `tabPayment Entry Reference` AS per ON si.name = per.reference_name
JOIN 
    `tabPayment Entry` AS paid ON per.parent = paid.name
WHERE 
    si.docstatus = 1 -- Assuming '1' represents the status for submitted/approved invoices
    AND paid.docstatus = 1; -- Assuming '1' represents the status for submitted/approved payments
